title: I Got 3700 rank in pessat
content: I got 3700 rank in Pessat, What are the branches that i can opt for? Is CS a possible option?

comments.body: He can get last year itself the cutoff was 3.3k , This year there is ai ml in Ecity campus
If 3300 was cut-off 3700 will get aiml?
Definitely infact I think until 3.5k the cse core cutoff would go and 4k for ai ml , counselling is offline a lot of the ppl won't come
Dude,this is PESSAT,solely for PES..hardly 2000 seats in total..
Yea da , ik infact I was in pes for a few days last year , I attended the counselling and all
If I don't go for first round of counselling, will I be allowed for the 2nd round ?
ohk Thank you so much, Do u hv any idea what the fees could be for aiml?
I got 7500 rank. Is it worth to attend counselling ? I wanted CS or AIML .. please guide â€¦
